title: Got Banned For Posting Racist Song Quote
body:
](https://gyazo.com/fbfbe9c179aba10465141aab7f838119)[

Yes, some people may find it offensive however my intentions were not to insult anyone. I was playing a normal Aram game with this meme playing on discord. No one else typed anything in all chat, except for me. It was suppose to be a joke for my friends, but I think someone from the enemy team got offended by the lyrics :(. It is immature of me and a mistake to post it in all chat though. I also find it strange that I got a 14 day suspension despite not getting any 25 game chat restrictions previously. Or is it because I was reported for racism that got me a 14-day?

replies.body: It will be because it was racist, Riot has 0 Tolerance for it
riot have infinite tolerance for shitkunts tho...
